title: Business Analyst
description:
Hiring for Business Analyst

Experience- 4yrs to 8yrs

Work Location: Bangalore

Skills: Business Analyst, Wealth Management/Capital Markets, Product Owner

Job Functions/Responsibilities:

Analyze Conflicting Requirements: Resolve conflicting priorities among users, assess their importance, and develop a cohesive set of software requirements.

Prioritize Business Needs: Identify and prioritize the requirements based on business value and impact.

Liaise with Development Teams: Collaborate with the development team to ensure requirements are understood and lead the development priorities for specific product areas.

Create Comprehensive Documentation: Document the analysis, findings, and solutions in a format meaningful for customers and the development team.

Present Business Requirements: Deliver presentations of business requirements and proposed solutions to stakeholders, ensuring clarity and alignment.

Monitor SDLC Progress: As a solution owner, oversee the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) to ensure smooth implementation from start to finish.

Resolve Ambiguities: Address any gaps, ambiguities, or oversights in the original specification during the development process.

Perform Unit Testing: Validate system changes by performing unit testing to ensure alignment with requirements.

Validate Final Product: Review the completed product with customers to confirm all business requirements are met satisfactorily.

Ensure Production Success: Monitor the production installation to ensure the smooth adoption and effective usage of new software features.
